definition: a detailed critical inspection, consider in a comprehensive way
details:
noun
- a detailed critical inspection
= synonyms: study
- the act of looking or seeing or observing
= synonyms: view, sight
- short descriptive summary (of events)
= synonyms: sketch, resume
verb
- consider in a comprehensive way
= synonyms: appraise
- plot a map of (land)
- make a survey of
- hold a review of troops
= example: hold a review of troops
= synonyms: review
- look over carefully or inspect
= example: look over carefully or inspect
- keep under surveillance
= synonyms: follow, surveil
